Text.Page:
Our weapons are thrashed from dealing with the Gutrends day in and day out. We need to fix them desperately, but haven't got the resources.

I've got so many other things to fix that I can't just leave to find the krymetal ore we need—but if you don't have any pressing business, maybe you could collect some for me?
Excellent! This is just what I need to make the repairs! Thanks so much.
Please—without that ore, our soldiers can't fight!
